name: Agents Maritimes et Consignataires de France
goal:
The purpose of the Union is to facilitate, insure or promote:
- The study and defense of the general interests of all its members and the Profession,
- The harmonization of relations and the strengthening of the bonds of confraternity which must exist between the members of the various branches of the commercial activity which it represents,
- The growth of the profession and the safety of commercial operations,
- The creation, organization and operation of any service of professional or social interest, and generally the exercise of all rights and prerogatives provided by law.

To this end, the Union is a permanent agent of its members to the public authorities, public or private entities and professional organizations. It shall examine, either at the request of the latter or on its own initiative, all the legislative and regulatory provisions affecting the profession and any administrative, financial, economic, environmental and social measures consistent with its purpose in to participate in their realization.
interests: Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
European Maritime Single window.
Reporting Formalities Directive.
Maritime Agent profession recognition
